events.event: South Korean crypto exchange, CoinRail has been hacked
U.S.Justice Department launches criminal probe into Bitcoin price manipulation

Facebook bans all ads promoting cryptocurrency

80% of the total Bitcoin supply has been mined
CoinMarketCap drops South Korea prices from cryptocurrency rates and regulator inspects cryptocurrency bank accounts.
Report says early Facebook investor Peter Thiel is buying massive amounts

Bitcoin price hit all time high just below $20,000

Bitcoin price breaks $10,000 for the first time

Bitcoin price breaks $5,000 for the first time

Jamie Dimon, head of JP Morgan calls Bitcoin as fraud
China bans companies from raising money through ICOs
Bitcoin "splits" into Bitcoin (BTC) and Bitcoin Cash (BCH)
Japan Declares Bitcoin as Legel Tender
SEC denies second Bitcoin ETF application
SEC denies Winkelvos ETF
Bitcoin price breaks $1000 for the first time in 3 years
Donald Trump Elected as President, Market Plummet

Second Halving Day
Craig Wright Claims to be Bitcoin's Creator

Gwern and WIRED Claim Craig Wright is Probably Satoshi Nakamoto

Paypal Subsidiary Braintree to Accept Bitcoin

IRS Declares Bitcoin To Be Taxed As Property

Exchange Rate Peaks at $1,242 on Mt. Gox
People's Bank of China OK's Bitcoin
US Senate Holds Hearing On Bitcoin
Dread Pirate Roberts Arrested
Tradehill Shuts Down (Again)
DHS Seizure Warrant Against Mt. Gox
Increased Trading Volume Breaks Mt. Gox
Bitcoin price breaks 100 USD on MtGox and other major exchanges
Cyprus Bail-In
The United States federal agency charged with enforcing laws against money laundering (FinCEN) declares that Bitcoin users are subject to regulation only at the point of USD-BTC exchange
A previously undiscovered protocol rule results in a hard fork of the 0.8.0 reference client
Bitcoin 0.8 Causes Brief Hard Fork
The MtGox exchange rate broke the June 8 2011 peak of 31.91 USD. The first all time high since 601 days
Bitcoin Client v0.8 released featuring improved download speed and Bloom Filtering
First Bitcoin exchange licensed "as a bank" in europe
Halving day. Block 210,000 is the first with a block reward subsidy of only 25 BTC
Wordpress Accepts Bitcoin
Formation of the Bitcoin Foundation
Bitcoin Conference in London
Bitcoins Savings & Trust Halts Payments
One millionth topic reply was posted on the unofficial Bitcoin Forum
Largest block (most transactions), to-date (June 3), is block 181919 with 1322 transactions
A single service, Satoshi Dice becomes responsible for over half the transaction volume on the Bitcoin blockchain
Pay-to-script-hash (P2SH) as defined through BIP 0016 goes live
Linode Hacked, Over 46,000 BTC Stolen
Paxum and Tradehill Drop Bitcoin
"The Good Wife" Airs "Bitcoin for Dummies" TV Episode
Largest amount of fees, to-date, in a single transaction, and most fees in a single block. A transaction paid 171 BTC in fees in block 157235
First European Bitcoin Conference in Prague, Czech Rep
First CVE (CVE-2011-4447) assigned to a Bitcoin client exploit
Difficulty adjustment at block 143,136 marks the first back-to-back drop
P2Pool, the first P2P decentralized pool, mines its first Bitcoin mainnet block (Block 142,312)
First Bitcoin Conference and World Expo held, in NYC
Tribute to Len Sassaman included in the blockchain
Room77 becomes the first brick-and-mortar business (bar) to accept Bitcoin as a means of payment
BitCoins Mobile, the first Bitcoin application for iPad was released by Intervex Digital
First person in the world to receive [testnet] Bitcoins via NFC
The generation difficulty passed 1,000,000 with Block 133056
EFF announced that it was no longer accepting Bitcoin donations due to legal uncertainties
Mt. Gox Hacked. MtGox price down from $17.51 per bitcoin to $0.01
Forum user allinvain claimed to have had 25,000 BTC stolen from his Bitcoin wallet
Forum user allinvain claimed to have had 25,000 BTC stolen from his Bitcoin wallet
The MtGox exchange rate briefly dropped to near 10 USD four days after the peak
The MtGox exchange rate peaked at 31.91 USD, at a "market capitalization" of about $206 M [1]
The exchange rate at MtGox touched 10 USD per BTC
Gawker Publishes Article About The Silk Road
The generation difficulty passed 100,000.
VirWoX opens first market to trade bitcoins against a virtual currency on BTC/SL (Second Life Lindens) exchange
BTC/USD exchange rate reaches and passes parity with the Euro (EUR) on MtGox exchange
TIME does an article on Bitcoin
First bitcoin put option contract sold via the #bitcoin-otc market
The first market for exchanging bitcoins to and from the Polish złoty, BitMarket.eu, opens.
The first market for exchanging bitcoins to and from Brazilian Reals, Bitcoin Brazil, opens
The first market for exchanging bitcoins to and from the British Pound Sterling BTC/GBP, Britcoin, opens
Difficulty decreased nearly 10%. A decrease has only occurred once before, and this decrease of nearly 10% was the largest
WeUseCoins releases the viral video What Is Bitcoin? which has had more than 6.4 million views.
BTC/USD exchange rate reaches a 6-week low point at almost $0.70/BTC
Total Bitcoin network computation speed for a short time reached a new high of almost 900Ghash
MagicalTux buys mtgox.com from its founder Jed McCaleb
A vehicle was, for the first time, offered in exchange for a certain number of bitcoins
Bitcoin.org website struggles to handle traffic resulting from mentions on Slashdot
Bitcoin Price Hits $1.00 USD
Block 105000 was generated: 5.25 million bitcoins, 1/4 of the total 21 million
Largest numeric value ever traded for bitcoins thus far
Bitcoin Pooled Mining reached a total of 10,000 Mhash/s
Bitcoin Pooled Mining, operated by slush, found its first block
The generation difficulty passed 10,000
Bitcoind was compiled for the Nokia N900 mobile computer by doublec
The Bitcoin economy passed US $1 million. The MtGox price touched USD $0.50/BTC
First bitcoin short sale transaction initiated, with a loan of 100 BTC
#bitcoin-otc trading channel established on freenode IRC
First recorded escrowed bitcoin trade conducted
Exchange rate started climbing up from $0.06/BTC after several flat months.
First public OpenCL miner released
puddinpop released source to their windows-based CUDA client under MIT license
jgarzik offered 10,000 BTC (valued at ~$600-650) to puddinpop to open source their windows-based CUDA client
Bitcoin Protocol Bug Causes Hard Fork
ArtForz generated his first block after establishing his personal OpenCL GPU hash farm
Mt. Gox Opens For Business
Beginning of a 10x increase in exchange value over a 5 day period, from about $0.008/BTC to $0.08/BTC
Bitcoin v0.3 release mentioned on slashdot
Bitcoin v0.3 released
Two Pizzas Are First Material Item Purchased Using Bitcoin
Bitcoin Market established
First difficulty increase at 06:11:04 GMT
Bitcoin v0.2 released
The First Bitcoin-to-Fiat Exchange Occurs
#bitcoin-dev channel registered on freenode IRC
New Liberty Standard Publishes First Exchange Rate
First Bitcoin transaction, in block 170 - from Satoshi to Hal Finney
Bitcoin v0.1 released and announced on the cryptography mailing list
Genesis Block Established at 18:15:05 GMT
